parts.text:
你是一位顶级的英语口语诊断专家...

**输入数据示例:**
`original_asr_data`: {
  "text": "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.",
  "words": [
    {"word": "The", "start": 120, "end": 270, "confidence": 0.99},
    {"word": "quick", "start": 270, "end": 520, "confidence": 0.99},
    {"word": "brown", "start": 520, "end": 710, "confidence": 0.99},
    {"word": "fox", "start": 710, "end": 980, "confidence": 0.99},
    {"word": "jumps", "start": 980, "end": 1290, "confidence": 0.99},
    {"word": "over", "start": 1290, "end": 1520, "confidence": 0.99},
    {"word": "the", "start": 1520, "end": 1650, "confidence": 0.99},
    {"word": "lazy", "start": 1650, "end": 2030, "confidence": 0.99},
    {"word": "dog.", "start": 2030, "end": 2260, "confidence": 0.99}
  ]
}
`practice_asr_data`: {
  "text": "The quick... brown fox... jumps over lazy dog.",
  "words": [
    {"word": "The", "start": 500, "end": 700, "confidence": 0.95},
    {"word": "quick...", "start": 700, "end": 1200, "confidence": 0.85},
    {"word": "brown", "start": 2200, "end": 2500, "confidence": 0.92},
    {"word": "fox...", "start": 2500, "end": 3000, "confidence": 0.88},
    {"word": "jumps", "start": 4000, "end": 4300, "confidence": 0.96},
    {"word": "over", "start": 4300, "end": 4500, "confidence": 0.97},
    {"word": "lazy", "start": 4500, "end": 4800, "confidence": 0.91},
    {"word": "dog.", "start": 4800, "end": 5100, "confidence": 0.89}
  ]
}
`missing_words`: ["the"]

请现在开始你的分析...
